title: Animation Bug in Snow Day Malzahar Recall
body:
There is a glitch with Snow Day Malzahar's recall animation. Whenever he backs the poro he summons is completely blue and textureless. 
[Recall Glitch 1](https://p2.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/jzldqI00eQIw47DRMq1Q0IgO7?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..a3NAb5YbeMxyf7TFjoHKeQ.Se63v9cRXyRiSUxckCNvs9kdkFL-OiZFsHoCrhGheByVZwuaByZobbg3xhLCD2qwJv2FNKxTnyom7fOv8rDY3Nn8g6YamCFf96VPo5tRMfeoL7owFUiIDiLMYtT9YBbiRLNnGYU2yxtIK2a4-izn3Se6iaoncs1eCD13ammkus5_4F974Qu5MsdL-7om9jW1Fwb662WOpRJYCKwjsrrp8vvxokIiizhThzVR69_dHjJTXEXBEnzaHdvmirKeQlbfeFzr42V6Owt0ISe3RwuQ0A.b6gHjJpXMeFtTF1N6beUCw)
[Recall Glitch 2](https://p2.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/KfgpeTz9gIYMECnECj5O5MKQw?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..V9A2UAsUpobsfYQaa6F6Ag.X0sWSmfM2FslTbN8pBU4KFb5g7PJLDVMFxH31E29uBs2nSAUMTEu0uv-eumWrM9DMCKUBYQr-pzkYBGW3Rfkv2osZQaYPe_3hpzvbRQKutcX8a1684SLC4mtHzZoicryYaAEAuPgM4woCTQ2KN-dp1eOnBgiOl3lNBtIAQUr5ZK36VOCIx0_JfcyHWjR4LEdZcuDrhcqqM0HFO1z09nGY2CyAs8JtWG5miVt4PkGgrkd4lRvXyR7b-P-nl6X91cwKVFCfTUzqJGrlrOj8di1Uw.bPViAzCog8n4bG0ynbLLdg)

replies.body: This is a know bug will be fixed next patch
While it's a known issue, it's not guaranteed to be fixed for 6.3.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Qq93W277,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-03T18:05:32.438+0000)
>
> While it's a known issue, it's not guaranteed to be fixed for 6.3.

Cool, thank you! Take your time, It's kinda funny.
oh didnt know know keep that in mind for next time

Hey SnowLeopard97 - 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
Thought I was the only one who had it hope it gets fixed with his rework
